code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BlockList=()=>{const[codeBlocks,setCodeBlocks]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchCodeBlocks=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL}/api/code-blocks`);if(!response.ok){throw new Error(`HTTP error!
